eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED WEEKLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Granite, MT; AT 12:00 PM ON NOV 26, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:00 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a TEST of Granite County's emergency paging system. No action is required. No action required
